MedlineCitation.CoiStatement: CONFLICT OF INTEREST: The authors declare that they have no conflict of interest. ANIMAL AND HUMAN RIGHTS STATEMENT: The study was approved by the Medical Ethics Committee of Guangxi Medical University. Written informed consents were obtained from all the patients, or their guardians and families prior to the study.
